channel.title: Bowling on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Bowling on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: The Scrolling Orb
item.description: Today in Tedium: Ever find yourself in a bar with a single arcade machine, and the machine is inevitably not targeting gamers? Like, rather than, say, a fighting game or something iconic like NBA Jam or even Donkey Kong, itâ€™s either a variation of Big Buck Hunter, a bowling game like Silver Strike Bowling, or a golf game like Golden Tee. These games, of course, aim for a wide audience, quite literally in the case of Big Buck Hunter.
